title: Notebook: Pogačar Now One of Cycling’s Greats, but did Merckx-like Domination Make it a Boring Giro d’Italia?
content:
Tour de Hoody: There is nothing humdrum about Pogačar's winning panache, even if this Giro's GC fight was essentially a done deal.

Read the full article at Notebook: Pogačar Now One of Cycling’s Greats, but did Merckx-like Domination Make it a Boring Giro d’Italia? on Velo.
author: ahood
